SageTVPlugin.Name: Podcast View
SageTVPlugin.Description: This plugin adds a filtered view for downloaded podcasts in your library. First, there is a new menu item under Videos from the main menu. There is also a new selection item in the options panel in the Videos menu. Version 1.1 includes the filters in the Music section for your audio podcasts.
SageTVPlugin.Author: pedz25
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: 1.0 - first release 1.1 - added support for audio podcasts to the Music menu.
